Scripts.OnClick: PanelTemplates_Tab_OnClick(GathererUI_DialogFrame); GathererUIFrameTab_OnClick();
GathererUI_ButtonClick();
GathererUI_ShowOptions();
GathererUI_HideOptions();
GathererUI_ShowRematchDialog();
showGathererInfo(1);
showGathererInfo(2);

Scripts.OnHide: -- Check if the options frame was opened by myAddOns if (MYADDONS_ACTIVE_OPTIONSFRAME == this) then ShowUIPanel(myAddOnsFrame); end

Scripts.OnClick: if ( Gather_Player and GatherConfig.users[Gather_Player].interested ) then if ( GatherConfig.users[Gather_Player].interested[1] ) then GatherConfig.users[Gather_Player].interested[1] = nil; end end
if ( Gather_Player and GatherConfig.users[Gather_Player].interested ) then if ( GatherConfig.users[Gather_Player].interested[2] ) then GatherConfig.users[Gather_Player].interested[2] = nil; end end
if ( Gather_Player and GatherConfig.users[Gather_Player].interested ) then if ( GatherConfig.users[Gather_Player].interested[0] ) then GatherConfig.users[Gather_Player].interested[0] = nil; end end
if (this:GetChecked()) then GatherConfig.disableWMFreezeWorkaround = 1; Gatherer_WorldMapDisplay:Show() else GatherConfig.disableWMFreezeWorkaround = 0; Gatherer_WorldMapDisplay:Hide() end

Scripts.OnShow: if ( GatherConfig.mapMinder ~= nil ) then this:SetChecked(GatherConfig.mapMinder) end

Scripts.OnClick: GathererUI_ZoneRematchDialog:Hide(); GathererUI_DestinationZoneDropDown:Hide();
GathererUI_ShowRematchDialogApply();
GathererUI_HelpFramePrevPageButton_OnClick();
GathererUI_HelpFrameNextPageButton_OnClick();
